Package it.cnr.isti.thematrix.scripting.modules

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InputModuleInterface  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Block  
    BlockReader  
    BufferFileModule
    Module implements single-writer, multiple-reader buffering on a disk file (with stream replication) between TheMatrix modules.
    BufferModule
    Module implements single-writer, multiple-reader buffering (with stream replication) between TheMatrix modules.
    BufferProxyModule
    A proxy class for matrix modules which need access to a common BufferModule.
    MatrixAggregate
    Implements the Aggregate module.
    MatrixApplyFunction
    in its funcArgs argument, this constructor receives the actual referecens to the attributes of the input module.
    MatrixCopyAttribute  
    MatrixDrop  
    MatrixExtendData  
    MatrixFileInput
    Class implementing the FileInputModule, which allows to read in IAD CSV files with assigned schema.
    MatrixFileOutput
    Class defining the behaviour of an output module.
    MatrixFilter
    Because this module requires a complex set of parameters, it is processed in a particular way.
    MatrixFirst
    Equivalent to UNIX `uniq` tool.
    MatrixMerge
    This module implements the merge operation between two datasets X,Y with a common key (internal key for the first one).
    MatrixNewData
    Creates a new dataset with the given schema.
    MatrixParameters
    Declares the formal parameters of a script and loads them.
    MatrixProduct
    Implements the Product module.
    MatrixProjection  
    MatrixRenameAttributes  
    MatrixRenameDataset  
    MatrixScriptInput
    This class implements the behavior of nested script.
    MatrixSort
    This class implements the SortModule functionality using the Jerboa on-disk FileSorter, with some caveats about concurrency.
    MatrixUnion
    enqueue the second input module to the first one, when the first reaches its end
